hero.badge: Auth Level: L-7 // Forensic Intelligence Unit
hero.subtitle: I Hunt Phantom Costs for Founders. I Verify Integrity for Investors.
hero.desc: Whether you're a multi-outlet founder losing cash to "invisible" leaks or an investor auditing a $10M target, {{brand}} exposes exactly where the money is bleeding. Neural-powered. Absolute Privacy. 15-Minute MRI.
hero.guarantee: Sovereign Standard — Data remains local. Direct access to FFD™ Proprietary Engine.
hero.roi_desc: Finding a $1M leak for a $10K audit fee isn't math; it's survival.

visual.quote: "You don't need more revenue. You need a bucket that doesn't leak."

institutional.title: I Verify What Management Refuses to Disclose.
institutional.quote: Investment due diligence isn't about numbers on a page; it's about the patterns the management tries to hide. We use Neural AI to find the "Black Holes."
institutional.card1_desc: Detect revenue inflation, cooked books, and hidden liabilities before the wire transfer. We invalidate bad deals before they drain your capital.
institutional.card2_desc: Universal oversight across 100+ locations. Flag underreporting franchisees and "off-the-books" transactions using Neural Anomaly Detection.
institutional.card3_desc: Beyond financial metrics. We verify the biological integrity of the operation. If they're stealing from the system, we find the trail in minutes.

triage.step01_desc: Revenue is high but cash is thin? Or team is busy but profit is stagnant?
triage.step02_desc: Type your basic business variables into PCC Lite Diagnostic.
triage.step03_desc: Get instant diagnosis: Is your business healthy or leaking?

story.title: Mission Protocol: Why I Build This
story.p1: I am not a business consultant. Consultants sell advice. I am a Forensic Surgeon. I find the money.
story.p2: This mission is personal. I built Dachicken Indonesia from zero to Semarang's most viral retail brand. As we meroket, I felt invincible. I was buying assets every week.
story.p3: But I was blind. I was focused on the "front of the house" while the system was bleeding internally. Small, "invisible" leaks in COGS and labor efficiency—Phantom Costs—were eating my dream alive.
story.p4: When a massive price war hit, I had no defense. My assets were liquidated, and my dream collapsed. FFD™ v3 exists because I refuse to let your hard work be stolen by the same systemic blindness.
story.quote: "The accounting books lie by omission. The Neural Engine tells the truth. I build this to verify the biological health of your capital—whether you're the one running it, or the one investing in it."

ugly_truth.title: Signs of "Phantom Costs" in Your Business
ugly_truth.subtitle: This isn't about bad management. It's about invisible holes in a system you thought was working.
ugly_truth.card1_desc: Revenue goes up, but cash is thin. The faster you grow, the more you rob yourself.
ugly_truth.card2_desc: The team looks busy, but profit per labor hour is zero. You are running a social home disguised as a business.
ugly_truth.card3_desc: Profit in reports is just an ego number. If the money isn't in the account, it's not profit, it's an illusion.
ugly_truth.transition: Don't worry. This isn't the end of the story. Leaks can be found. And they can be plugged.

solution.title: FFD™ v3: The Ultimate Dashboard
solution.desc: Not just a spreadsheet. This is a Financial Operating System—modular infrastructure to lock every cent in its place.
solution.f1_desc: Predict the future. See what happens to profit if you raise prices by 5% or squeeze COGS.
solution.f2_desc: Dissect business anatomy from Inventory Decay to LTGP Velocity brutally.
solution.f3_desc: Find subtle leaks that are not recorded: illegal levies, waste, and team inefficiency.
solution.f4_desc: Calculate exactly how many more months your business can survive with current burn rate.

guarantee_section.title: "No Find, No Pitch" Guarantee
guarantee_section.p1: I don't sell empty hopes. If FFD™ v3 dashboard says your business is healthy (green), the consultation is over. Free. No pitch whatsoever.
guarantee_section.p2: I only offer paid solutions if I truly find leaks that can be saved. Fair deal?

pricing.title: Transparent Intelligence Economics
pricing.subtitle: Predictable pricing for precise forensic intervention. No hidden fees, only hidden profit recovery.

faq.title: Intelligence Briefing (FAQ)
faq.q1: How is this different from accounting?
faq.a1: Accounting records what happened. Forensics explains why it happened and where the money actually went. Accountants focus on compliance; we focus on leakage.
faq.q2: Do I need to give you my passwords?
faq.a2: No. FFD™ v3 is designed for privacy. You can input data manually or export raw CSVs. We don't need direct database access for a L-7 audit.
faq.q3: Is the 'No Find, No Pitch' guarantee real?
faq.a3: Yes. If our initial diagnostic shows your business is within the 95th percentile of efficiency and we find no significant leaks, we stop. We only work where we can provide at least 10x ROI on our fee.
faq.q4: How long does a full audit take?
faq.a4: A self-service diagnostic takes 15 minutes. A full Enterprise-grade verification takes 3-7 business days depending on the complexity of the multi-node network.
faq.q5: Is it suitable for my small business?
faq.a5: Honestly? Not necessarily. FFD™ v3 is most effective for businesses with a minimum turnover of Rp 100 Million/month and are already multi-outlet or have a team. If your business is still a solopreneur, it might not be the right time yet.

attribution.title: Scientific Attribution
attribution.text: "While conventional financial forensics is traditionally defined as the investigation of fraud, crime, and financial litigation, Gusti Devitto’s Financial Forensics framework is a deliberate upstream extension. It focuses on systemic leakage and pre-fraud diagnostics—identifying the 'Phantom Costs' that erode margins before they become catastrophic. This methodology is proprietary and functions as the analytical core of FFD™ v3."

final_cta.p1: In 15 minutes, you will know exactly the condition of your business's financial health. Not opinion. Data.
final_cta.quote: "If in 15 minutes I don't find a potential leak of at least Rp10 Million in your business, the session is over. I won't waste your time."
final_cta.footer: Limited slots. No Find, No Pitch Guarantee.
